column5: I am guessing I am not alone when I say I have been spending far more time outside this past month than normal To try to avoid going stir crazy I have been doing lots of bike rides, hikes, taking the dog for a walk and so forth There are a few items I have been using a lot and most were bought as part of the gear I use on our fishing trips Figured I would try writing them up and here it is https://www.northernjacks.com/post/things-i-like-and-recommend-while-social-distancing Cheers Andrew
I like the Patagonia jacket but it is a bit pricey for me. Probably will buy the Under Armour hoodie.
Glad you liked the post Bill I hear ya about the Patagonia jacket - think I mentioned in my post that I got mine as a work giveaway but I will say I love it
Thanks for this Andrew!!Â  I made sure to sign up and marked it in my favorites!   Chrispy!
Awesome - glad you enjoyed it and I appreciate the sign up!
